message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'll love it. My starting price is $110. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $90 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need at least $100. How about we split the difference and meet at $105?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $95 is still too far below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $100. This is my final offer. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $92. Can you meet me at that price?
